message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $120 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $160?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $160 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $140 for the product.
